meanings: (서게 하다) stand, erect, make sth stand
(기념비 등을) erect, set up, put up

meanings.meaning: draw yourself up/rise to your full height

vlive.korean: 세우고 밥 먹어볼까요? Should I continue eating with my hair up? 듣기 View video GFRIEND : 미안 또 우리야 ㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋ
vlive.english: Should I continue eating with my hair up?

vlive.korean: 다시 세우고 있어. It's straightening it up again. 듣기 View video 졸잼티비 (joLjamTV) : [theHybrid] 은지원, 짓궂은"악마" 소환 _ ep9
세우고 한번 해보겠습니다. Let's hold it up and do it. 듣기 View video Stray Kids : GOING GOING SKZ
vlive.english: Let's hold it up and do it.

vlive.korean: 여러분 여기서 제가 운전을, 세우고. I will park the car here. 듣기 View video Apink : Apink 뽐데이 드라이브데이트🚗
vlive.english: I will park the car here.

vlive.korean: 내일 밤 세우고 오실 거예요? Are you going to stay up the whole night? 듣기 View video IDOL RADIO : IDOL RADIO' ep#45. 예.지.앞.비 (w. 비투비)
vlive.english: Are you going to stay up the whole night?

examples.korean: They drew their wagons into a laager and set up camp. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 마차들로 라아거를 세우고 캠프를 쳤다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They drew their wagons into a laager and set up camp. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He turned up the collar of his coat and hurried out into the rain. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 외투 깃을 올려 세우고 서둘러 빗속으로 나섰다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He turned up the collar of his coat and hurried out into the rain. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The dog stood listening, its ears cocked. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 개가 귀를 쫑긋 세우고 듣고 서 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The dog stood listening, its ears cocked. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I’ve been planning how I’m going to spend the day. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 그 날을 어떻게 보낼지 계획을 세우고 있는 중이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I’ve been planning how I’m going to spend the day. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: They drew up and executed a plan to reduce fuel consumption. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 연료 소비를 줄이기 위한 계획을 세우고 실행했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They drew up and executed a plan to reduce fuel consumption. Add to Wordbook
